localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: Karaoke with friends together on the web or in VR and bring a little laughter back to everyone's homes. The brand new quarantine pastime. Currently in Beta!
blogPost.body: Karaoke with friends together on the web or in VR and bring a little laughter back to everyone's homes. The brand new quarantine pastime. Currently in Beta!
blogPost.title: Karaoke Nite - Karaoke with friends together on the web or in VR
blogPost.author: Sonny Li

localize.description: 在网络上或VR中和朋友一起K歌，把欢声笑语带回大家的家中。全新的检疫消遣方式。目前正在测试中!
localize.tagline: 在网络上或VR中与朋友一起K歌。

localize.description: 在網絡上或VR中和朋友一起K歌，把歡聲笑語帶回大家的家中。全新的檢疫消遣方式。目前正在測試中!
localize.tagline: 在網絡上或VR中與朋友一起K歌。

previous.excerpt: We have created a motivating way for people to mix exercise and fun. It is a library of augmented reality games: Flappy Bird AR, Pong AR, and Brick Breaker AR. Do pushups to play the games. Go play at playar.ai and earn your spot on the leaderboard!
previous.title: PlayAR - Augmented reality games to get you moving

localize.description: 我们为人们创造了一种将运动和乐趣相结合的激励方式。这是一个增强现实游戏库。Flappy Bird AR, Pong AR, 和Brick Breaker AR. 做俯卧撑去玩游戏。去playar.ai玩吧，在排行榜上赢得你的位置!
localize.tagline: 增强现实游戏让你动起来

localize.description: 我們爲人們創造了一種將運動和樂趣相結合的激勵方式。這是一個增強現實遊戲庫。Flappy Bird AR, Pong AR, 和Brick Breaker AR. 做俯臥撐去玩遊戲。去playar.ai玩吧，在排行榜上贏得你的位置!
localize.tagline: 增強現實遊戲讓你動起來

next.title: Philanthropy is a ‘PR scam,’ says CEO who raised his workers’ minimum pay to $70,000 https://t.co/QLr3Pef05H

localize.full_text: 慈善事业是个 "公关骗局"，将工人最低工资提高到7万元的CEO说：https://t.co/QLr3Pef05H。
慈善事業是個 "公關騙局"，將工人最低工資提高到7萬元的CEO說：https://t.co/QLr3Pef05H。
